sentences.en: A blind streak of stubbornness in him wouldn't let him back down.
sentences.cn: 盲目的顽固是不会让他回心转意的.

sentences.en: Because of your colonel's stubbornness, we are far behind schedule.
sentences.cn: 由于你们上校的愚顽不化, 我们的进度远远落后了.

sentences.en: But I hitched my refusal to a post of stubbornness.
sentences.cn: 但我近乎顽固地拒绝了.

sentences.en: Generation gap, conservation, reminiscence, pedantry and stubbornness all basically derive from that.
sentences.cn: 代沟, 保守, 怀旧, 迂腐顽固,基本都源于此.

sentences.en: Have you learned nothing of the stubbornness of Dwarves?
sentences.cn: 难道你还不了解那个矮人的倔强 吗 ?

sentences.en: He had a streak of stubbornness.
He has a touch of stubbornness in his composition.
His brilliance gave us civil - rights laws; his stubbornness gave us Vietnam.
sentences.cn: 他的才能带给了我们《民权法案》, 他的固执带给了我们越南战争.

sentences.en: His refusal to talk was simple stubbornness.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝交谈完全是因为固执。

sentences.en: I couldn't tell if his refusal to talk was simple stubbornness.
sentences.cn: 我不清楚他拒绝说话是否只是因为他的顽固不化。

sentences.en: I might have become a dangerous man with all that stubbornness and obstinacy built into me.
sentences.cn: 我若是养就了那种根深蒂固的犟脾气，也许就成了危险分子。

sentences.en: Matt looked at Hugh and saw the stubbornness in the set of his shoulders.
sentences.cn: 马特看着休，从他坚挺的肩膀中看出了他的倔强。

sentences.en: Now , however , her latent stubbornness was forcing itself to the fore.
sentences.cn: 现在, 她这久蕴的天性却要喷发!

sentences.en: She's a curious mixture of stubbornness and servility.
sentences.cn: 她既固执又恭顺，令人捉摸不透。

sentences.en: Vladimir became jealously angry and challenged Eugene to a duel. Through stubBornness Eugene accepted the challenge.
sentences.cn: 弗拉基米尔又嫉妒又生气,终于向叶甫盖尼提出要和他决斗. 叶甫盖尼出于执拗,接受了他的挑战.

words.tran_cn: 顽固的；顽强的；难处理的

trans.tran_cn: 倔强，顽强，牛性，牛脾气，犟劲
